profile:
Lincoln appliance has serviced Niagara for 50 years with excellent and dependable appliance install and repair services. 

All of our service technicians are bonded and factory authorized for repairs and warranty work on numerous brands of appliances. 

If you require parts or would like a service call you can contact us by booking online or giving us a call at 905-646-5570.
